participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often feeling out of place and yearning for independence.
participant_1.background: I am dissatisfied with the school life I have had so far. I wished I was older so I could move out. I have one close friend I grew up with. My dad is very strict with his kids. I worry about money even though I am in high school.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about her career, yet she has a quirky side that comes through in her tattoos.
participant_2.background: I work in a doctor's office. I have a rose tattooed on my right ankle. I only wear silver jewelry. There are thorns tattooed on my toes. I am studying to be a dental hygienist but I hate seeing patients' saliva.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work in a doctor's office.
It's pretty interesting. I get to see a lot of different patients and learn about different medical conditions.
That sounds like it would be really rewarding.
It can be. It's also really busy, but I like the fast pace.
I can imagine. Do you like it?
Yeah, I do. It's a great job.
I like to read, write, and paint. I also like to go hiking and biking.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I like to read and write too.
Oh, cool. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mystery novels.
Me too! I love historical fiction. What's your favorite historical fiction book?
I'm not sure I could pick a favorite, but I really like "The Pillars of the Earth" by Ken Follett.
Oh, that's a great book! I loved it too.
